com.petgame.ui

Class Tyrunt

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.petgame.ui.Pet
      • com.petgame.ui.Tyrunt

  • public class Tyrunt
extends Pet
    This class represents a pet of type Tyrunt in the game. It extends the Pet class and manages attributes like health, fullness, sleep, and happiness. It also runs background threads to gradually decrease these stats over time.

    • Field Summary

        points - The points or score associated with the pet.
        healthCur - The current health value of the pet.
        healthMax - The maximum health value of the pet.
        fullnessCur - The current fullness value of the pet.
        fullnessMax - The maximum fullness value of the pet.
        sleepCur - The current sleep value of the pet.
        state - The current state of the pet (e.g., idle, sleeping, etc.).
        sleepMax - The maximum sleep value of the pet.
        happinessCur - The current happiness value of the pet.
        happinessMax - The maximum happiness value of the pet.
        lastVet - The timestamp of the last vet visit.
        lastExercise - The timestamp of the last exercise session.
        lastPlay - The timestamp of the last play session.
        gm - The GameManager instance used to manage the game state and interactions.
